```{r}
#| include: false
#| screenshot: true
library(here)
library(DiagrammeR)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

Overall relationship between A and Y:

```{r echo=FALSE}
#| echo: false
grViz("
digraph {
  graph []
  node [shape = plaintext]
    A [label = 'A']
    Y [label = 'Y']
  edge [minlen = 1.5]
    A->Y [label = 'c']
  { rank = same; A; Y }
}")
```

Relationship between A and Y through M:

```{r echo=FALSE}
#| echo: false

grViz("
digraph {
  graph []
  node [shape = plaintext]
    A [label = 'A']
    M [label = 'M']
    Y [label = 'Y']
  edge [minlen = 1.5]
    A->Y [label = 'c*', xlabel = 'c']
    A->M [taillabel = 'a']
    M->Y [label = 'b']
  { rank = same; A; Y }
  { rank = min; M;}
}")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
#| echo: false
grViz("
digraph {
  graph []
  node [shape = plaintext]
    X [label = 'Physical activity']
    M [label = 'BMI']

  edge [minlen = 1.5]
    X->Y [label = 'c*', xlabel = 'c']
    X->M [taillabel = 'a']

  { rank = same; X; Y }
  { rank = min; M;}
}")
```
